tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EmployeeExpenses (
    expense_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    expense_type VARCHAR(50),
    expense_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    expense_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE equipment_purchase (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(255),
    purchase_date DATE,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE travel_reimbursement (
    employee_id INT,
    expense_date DATE,
    expense_amount DECIMAL,
    expense_category VARCHAR,
    PRIMARY KEY (employee_id, expense_date)
);

CREATE TABLE equipment_purchases (
    transaction_id INT,
    employee_id INT,
    purchase_date DATE,
    equipment_name VARCHAR,
    equipment_cost DECIMAL,
    PRIMARY KEY (transaction_id)
);

CREATE TABLE employee_information (
    employee_id INT,
    employee_name VARCHAR,
    department_id INT,
    hire_date DATE,
    is_remote_employee BOOLEAN,
    PRIMARY KEY (employee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE equipment_purchases (
    employee_id INT,
    equipment_id INT,
    purchase_date DATE,
    purchase_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    description TEXT
);
